description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $18.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Construction Demathieu Bard. The average
  contract duration was 2.75 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $19.2M. The longest
  contract was 3.72 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $43.5M.
